Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters used for interactable prompts.

dummyPoly1.Wiki: Specify the dummy polygon ID that is the center of the bottom of the range. If there is no dummy polygib or -1 is entered, the center coordinates will be the reference.

dummyPoly2.Wiki: Used only when the range type is a capsule. Additional dummy polygon (capsule) that creates a line segment with two dummy polygons

baseHeightOffset.Wiki: How much to raise or lower the Y coordinate of the bottom (cylinder / prism)

textId.Wiki: The FMG Entry ID to display.

invalidFlag.Wiki: If the event flag is ON, then this action will not appear.

grayoutFlag.Wiki: If the event flag is ON, then this action will be grayed out.

priority.Wiki: Priority when displaying multiple actions, 0 is highest priority.

execInvalidTime.Wiki: Invalid time after execution (-infinite by value)

sameCategoryActionDisplay.Wiki: Whether or not action buttons with the same category specified in the program are displayed on top of each other.
